mean_cn: n. 纪念物，纪念碑，请愿书；  adj. 纪念的，记忆的
mean_en: something (such as a monument or ceremony) that honors a person who has died or serves as a reminder of an event in which many people died
word_etyma: memor记忆+ial形容词后缀，…的 → 记忆的; 纪念物，纪念日
sentence: Mao Memorial is built to remind us of his great deeds.
sentence_trans: 建立毛主席纪念像是用来纪念他的伟大事迹。
